Hello!

Welcome to my personal (work in progress) site. I am a student enrolled in a Master of Science degree in Statistics and data science, specializing in biostatistics. I use R, SAS, and Python for statistical analysis and visualizations. My interest is statistical computing applied to spatial statistics, infectious diseases modelling and Bayesian data analysis.
